  physical_appearance: This is a figuring of Christ crucified on a cross. The cross is dark brown
 with a running lozenges geometric motif. At the top of the cross there is an ivory sign. The figure of Christ is wearing a loincloth around the waist. He is being crucifixed on the cross
 with details of blood running down his arms and feet.

  subject_terms_1: exports worship lozenges figurines Roman Catholicism

  context_2: crucifixions

  context_3: c. 30-33AD

  context_4: 30 AD

  context_5: 33 AD

  context_6: Jerusalem

  sgcool_label_text: The Crucified Christ is a central theme in Christian art around the world
 and lustrous white ivory is an ideal material for representing the human figure. High-quality devotional Christian images made in Asia
 like this one
 were often exported to Europe as luxury goods or high-level gifts. \r\n\r\nThe skill of the carver in convincingly rendering facial features
 muscles
 and even veins creates a figure with deep emotional impact. The arms and a part of the loin cloth were made from separate pieces of ivory
 a technique common of European ivory figures.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a figuring of Christ crucified on a cross. The cross is dark brown, with a running lozenges geometric motif. At the top of the cross there is an ivory sign. The figure of Christ is wearing a loincloth around the waist. He is being crucifixed on the cross, with details of blood running down his arms and feet.
metadata.subject_terms_1: exports worship lozenges figurines Roman Catholicism
metadata.subject_terms_2: Exports Figurines Crucifixion of the Christ Crosses Jesus Christ Worship
metadata.sgcool_label_text:
The Crucified Christ is a central theme in Christian art around the world, and lustrous white ivory is an ideal material for representing the human figure. High-quality devotional Christian images made in Asia, like this one, were often exported to Europe as luxury goods or high-level gifts. 

The skill of the carver in convincingly rendering facial features, muscles, and even veins creates a figure with deep emotional impact. The arms and a part of the loin cloth were made from separate pieces of ivory, a technique common of European ivory figures.
